plot: Inspired by actual events, a group of fame-obsessed teenagers use the internet to track celebrities' whereabouts in order to rob their homes.
title: The Bling Ring

tomatoes.consensus: While it's certainly timely and beautifully filmed, The Bling Ring suffers from director Sofia Coppola's failure to delve beneath the surface of its shallow protagonists' real-life crimes.

writers: Nancy Jo Sales (based on the Vanity Fair article "The Suspect Wore Louboutins" by)
